split:
\begin{split}
  C^{(2)} &= \frac1{4L^2} \left[ \psi \left(\sin\theta \, d\theta \wedge
  d\phi) + \sin\tilde{\theta} \, d\tilde{\theta} \wedge d\tilde{\phi} \right) + \cos\theta \cos\tilde{\theta}
  \, d\phi \wedge d\tilde{\phi} \right] \\
  &\quad - \frac{a(\rho)}{2L^2} \left( d\tilde{\theta} \wedge \sigma^1 +
  \sin\tilde{\theta} \, d\tilde{\phi} \wedge \sigma^2 \right)~, 
\

\begin{split}
  dC^{(6)} &= -\frac1{L^2} v^{(4)} \wedge \left\{ 2 \mathrm{e}^{{2\Phi}}
  \left[\mathrm{e}^{{2h}} +\frac1{16} \mathrm{e}^{{-2h}} (1-a^4) \right] d\rho\wedge
  d\tilde{\theta} \wedge \sin\tilde{\theta}\, d\tilde{\phi} \phantom{\frac12} \right. \\
  &\quad \left. + \frac14 d\left[ 
  \mathrm{e}^{{2\Phi}} \dot{a} \left( d\tilde{\theta} \wedge \sigma^2 - \sin \tilde{\theta}\, d\tilde{\phi} \wedge
  \sigma^1 \right) 
  - (a^2-1) \mathrm{e}^{{2\Phi-2h}} d\rho \wedge (\sigma^3-L A^3) \right] \right\}~,
\

\begin{split}
  C^{(6)} &= -\frac1{L^2} v^{(4)} \wedge \left\{ 
  \Psi(\rho)\, d\tilde{\theta} \wedge \sin\tilde{\theta}\, d\tilde{\phi} \right. \\
  &\quad \left. + \frac14 \left[ 
  \mathrm{e}^{{2\Phi}} \dot{a} \left( d\tilde{\theta} \wedge \sigma^2 - \sin \tilde{\theta}\, d\tilde{\phi} \wedge
  \sigma^1 \right) 
  - (a^2-1) \mathrm{e}^{{2\Phi-2h}} d\rho \wedge (\sigma^3 -L A^3) \right]
  \right\}~, 
\
